type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Lord Noble
rules_text:
Reach
[i]Failnaught[/i] – When you cast Claude, Almyra's King, tap each creature target player controls.
[i]Wind God[/i] – Whenever Claude deals combat damage to a player, untap up to three target creatures you control, put a reach counter on each creature that doesn't have reach that was untapped this way.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {G}{W}
